attributes.action: Stop  suspected terrorists and asylum seekers using the european bill of human rights as a means to avoid being deported from our country.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
There have been cases where the british government cannot deport people suspected of terrorism because of a stupid law made in another country that states it would be against their rights as humans if we sent them back to a country that is war torn or has no infrastructure to sustain a specified standard of living.

This for us is madness, keeping these people here is putting our lives in danger and sending them back should be as simple as putting them on a plane. Like the australians do!

We should not be wasting "control orders" on people only to have them abscond which then leaves us in more danger.

If you know who/where they are, go and get rid of them and stop endangering your own people.

As for the Bill of Human Right's. We should be able to excersize when, how and to what extent this law is applied. regardless of what "brussels" says.

Please sort this out, or on your concience and with the lives of your own people will the consequences be payed.
